author: Soureek89
body: Updating topHLTDQMOffline package under DQMOffline/Trigger so that it is able to read from "hltTriggerSummaryAOD" collection (present in both Data and MC) in addition to "hltTriggerSummaryRaw" collection (present in MC only and not in Data). Tested code to be ok by running the matrix for TTbar events.
title: Soureek updating topHLTDQMOffline package under DQMOffline/Trigger
